text:
Cloudmark Labs | Paris, France | Full time, on site

We develop the Gateway product, a high performance, high scalability, multi-protocol, message processing software solution written in C using advanced techniques (event programming, multi-threading, lock-less approaches) on Linux.

We are looking for a Junior and a Senior Software Developer to join our team in Paris.

You're fluent in C, French and English and love system programming ? Check out the detailed offers here:

- Senior: https://www.cloudmark.com/en/careers/tGWmZO

- Junior: https://www.cloudmark.com/en/careers/7P97BH
